text:
Newlyweds PC-Nick Jonas Attended A Delhi Event & Barely Managed To Keep Eyes Off Each Other!
Newlyweds PC-Nick Jonas Attended A Delhi Event & Barely Managed To Keep Eyes Off Each Other!
After her royal wedding celebrations in Jodhpur, Priyanka Chopra along with husband Nick Jonas had flown down to Delhi for two days. During this time span, they hosted a reception party and the next day, they fulfilled work-commitments.
Agencies
Walking hand-in-hand, the couple was present at the Bumble's launch party event in New Delhi. Donning a blush pink dress complete with a chain belt around her waist this was PC's first official work outing after their wedding.
PTI
However, what made everyone gush all over again was how PC and Nick could barely manage to keep their eyes off each other.
Agencies
Don't Miss 161 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 186 SHARES 161 SHARES 1.1 K SHARES
Here's a proof that no matter where in the world Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra are, keeping eyes off each other is not their strong suit.
title: Newlyweds PC-Nick Jonas Attended A Delhi Event & Barely Managed To Keep Eyes Off Each Other!
